mapper.select: SELECT * FROM clubs_notice_boards WHERE club_notice_is_deleted = FALSE AND club_no = #{clubNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clubs_notice_boards (club_notice_title, club_notice_content, account, club_no) VALUES (#{clubNoticeTitle}, #{clubNoticeContent}, #{account}, #{clubNo})
